content.text:
I'll perform a quick warmup by exploring the repository structure to understand the codebase.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /c/Users/jaewoong/Desktop/project/inflearn/todo-list && find . -type f -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.json" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /c/Users/jaewoong/Desktop/project/inflearn/todo-list && ls -la</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="read">
<parameter name="path">/c/Users/jaewoong/Desktop/project/inflearn/todo-list</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

The repository is a Next.js todo-list application with the following structure:

- **Main files modified**: app/layout.tsx, app/ui.tsx, config/material-tailwind-theme-provider.tsx
- **Deleted**: component/todo.tsx
- **New directory**: components/
- **Configuration**: tailwind.config.ts, tsconfig.json, package.json, package-lock.json
- **Settings**: .claude/settings.local.json

The project appears to be in active development with a recent commit "ui 작업중" (working on UI), refactoring components and updating the design system setup. The transition from component/todo.tsx to components/ directory suggests a restructuring of the component organization.

I'm ready to help you search through this codebase. What would you like me to find?
